name: mvccore/ext-debug-tracy-mvccore
description: MvcCore - Extension - Debug - Tracy - Panel MvcCore - render and add into tracy debug panel current MvcCore application instance, printed by \Tracy\Dumper::toHtml(\MvcCore\Application::GetInstance()); to display main application objects used to render current page response. Rendered objects inside MvcCore app: \MvcCore\Request, \MvcCore\Response, \MvcCore\Router, \MvcCore\Controller, all preroute, predispatch and postdispatch configured handlers and many other internal application values.
